item.description:
Bring your kids to KID'S KARAOKE at the CLUBHOUSE - Bay Pointe Country Club - Wareham/Onset

I've done this several times at other venues and finally found a place down here that is willing to try it.

The kids have a blast. So bring your kids, nieces, nephews, grandkids... whoever.. just bring them
(big kids can sing too)

It's just as much fun for parents cuz it's gives them the opportunity to go out with their friends without getting a sitter.

The food and drinks are reasonable priced. Full bar, draft beer, pizza, hot dogs, burgers, chicken fingers... and the food is pretty good.

I hope you can make it. As you know I try to make these events kid freindly so we can have fun and share it with them... plus it's a pain to get a sitter all the time.

Rog out !
item.how_to_find_us: I'm the DJ - the Clubhouse is down the driveway beyond the Function Hall.

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Kid's Karaoke at the Clubhouse Wareham/Onset
